about.title: I'm Capí Joy, songwriter, writer and independent artist.
paragraphs: I love turning feelings and experiences into words and songs. My art is born from a deep place where spirituality, humanity and truth intertwine.
I write to touch hearts, sing to set souls free and create to inspire lighter, more authentic lives.
My purpose is to share messages that awaken faith, hope and inner freedom, because I believe true peace begins within us.

music.title: BASTA Stage
music.description: A visual and musical project filled with intense energy and a free soul. "BASTA" is a cry of truth and transformation.

card1.title: ENOUGH.
card1.description: Composed in the 80s, "ENOUGH." re-emerges with remarkable strength for today's world. It's not a political song; it's a cry of the soul, a call to transform our own hearts and return to God's principles. It's an invitation to say "enough" to everything that pulls us away from truth and love.
card1.alt: Cover art for the single ENOUGH.

topics.topic1: Here, every word, song and project is born from a real, human and Divine place. This is a refuge for those seeking lightness, truth and inspiration to live with greater meaning.
topics.topic2: The Return. A story that should never have been told. An intense, real and transforming account. "The Return" is not just a story, it is a testimony of choices, feelings and paths that deeply marked Capí Joy's life. Written with transparency and courage, this literary project shows that even the hardest stories can teach, set free and inspire others.

blog.title: Blog / Reflections
blog.description: A devotional series in three languages, written in a practical and direct way. From Psalm 19, Capí Joy reveals five spiritual keys to live with purpose and reach true success. It begins in the soul and overflows into life.
